reviews.customers_say: Customers find the sweater has designer quality, with a gorgeous bright appearance and amazing material that feels like silk. They describe it as super soft, cozy, and perfect in fit, with one customer noting it can be worn both casually and dressy. The sizing receives mixed feedback - while some find it huge, others mention it's not oversized enough.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Soft and Sweet - Get it!
items.body: Love, Love, Love this sweater. My wife bought this one for a perfect fit, but I can see why someone would want to buy an oversized version as well. The green is just beautiful, and it's well made and super soft. This one was a great value honestly. I am never expecting high end quality on Amazon. It sort of is what it is but I liked this so much I wanted her to get the Lavender but seeing the green in person was a great choice. Read more
items.author: john A.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute & Top Quality
items.body: Really cute top that my friend and I wore to play golf in! We both matched and looked really cute. It is perfect to wear over a golf top or just to wear on its own. It’s great quality but a little bit heavy so I would recommend wearing it on a colder day. I got the black and white but it also comes in other colors which I will consider buying. Sweater like material with a good sized v neck. I would purchased again. Read more
items.author: Maria G

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great heft but not loose neckline as pictured
items.body: Super cute, thick, heavy just as advertised other than the neck is not naturally as wide as the pic. I was looking for a big, loose, wide neck that settled off one shoulder but the neckline doesn't quite fit. Other than a tighter than expected neckline though, it fits the bill in a surprising way I. That it is great quality and feels like it will last. Read more
items.author: MissCarleyRoxanne

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Adorable sweater
items.body: Absolutely adorable very well made not as oversized as in the picture so if you want it slouchy and big you need to order up two sizes Read more
items.author: Melissandra James

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars I'm so impressed !
items.body: Aside from not being oversized at all, this sweater is amazing. Very soft, not too thick or too thin, vibrant color, and so easy to wear. It's really great, just don't expect oversized unless you size up, maybe 2x. Read more
items.author: DiBeth

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Pleasantly Surprised!!!!
items.body: the photo is coming later... but first things first. I thought it would be longer at the waist when I opened the shrink package... but when I felt the material and put it on...Bay-Bay!!!!!!!! No way. Is this the best sweater ever?? The cable stitching did not pull away and made it look thread bare; it felt almost luxurious...heavy, well made and simply lovely. I will post a picture later, especially since my size is actually bigger than a 3x. It will NOT fit slouchy as I would have preferred in the picture, but it fits SMART, and is complimentary. Yes this is a long review, but If you're a true 4x like I am, dont make the mistake I made: Order more than one color!!! It needs 7 stars not 5! Read more
items.author: Lewan N. Powers-Green

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Too big for the look I wanted
items.body: Very nice sweater. I relied on the comments like I usually do, but this time I ordered too large & had to return. The color is very nice. The sweater has a little weight to it. I order 2XL when I may have done well with an L or XL. Read more
items.author: Rhonda Clemmer Dixon

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Wanted to Love
items.body: Really wanted to like this sweater but it was just made too cheap for me. The black was rubbing on to the white part when it was folded and was afraid to wash. Ended up sending back but the weight was perfect and loved the style and comfort Read more
items.author: Maddie Bertrand

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress V Neck Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress V Neck Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: A White, B_white01, Gray, All Peach, Be Hot Pink, To Blue, Be Brown, All Navy Blue, All Black, Red, A G_white02, All Pink, Be Purple, A G_navy Blue01. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
